author: phil crawley
content: On the night before I left for the sea school, my frail bedridden grand mother called me to her bedside, she drew me close, slipped me a 10/- note and then this dear old lady whispered, if you come home with a tattoo I’ll fkn kill ya, maybe it was the shock of hearing her talk like that but 34 years in the Merchant Navy, I never got a tattoo.

author: Dave S
content: But on a sailor they look cool!

author: Phil
content:
Never got a tattoo, don’t want one!
Some people who got them, esp. women, wish they haden’t.
On women, they look ugly.
